column4: howcome I can only use one app that uses sound at a time? i.e. if i have quodlibet open and want to watch a video on firefox i have to close both and then reopen firefox
Are you using OSS, or ALSA?
whatever is the default with ubuntu
which is better and which will fix the above problem?
Alsa is better, and that is what Ubuntu uses by default.
ok then i'm using alsa; do you have any idea why it does this?
Some programs still use OSS though, including flash 7
so I can't get around it with flash 7? does flash 9 fix that?
Yes, flash 9 fixes that problem, and with other programs you can work around it using aoss...
sudo apt-get install alsa-oss then run the application, but with aoss in front of it like: aoss firefox
awesome man thanks for your help
so you don't have to back up all your music etc when you reinstall
Why not just keep it in your separate /home though?
i guess there isn't a reason not to. I don't have a separate home partition though so i DO have a separate data partition
